mapper.sql: goodsBrand.id as id , goodsBrand.brand_number as brandNumber , goodsBrand.brand_name as brandName , goodsBrand.brand_english_name as brandEnglishName , goodsBrand.brand_initial as brandInitial , goodsBrand.state as state , goodsBrand.is_delete as isDelete , goodsBrand.directly_org_id as directlyOrgId , goodsBrand.hierarchy_id as hierarchyId , goodsBrand.creator_id as creatorId , goodsBrand.creator as creator , goodsBrand.create_time as createTime , goodsBrand.updator_id as updatorId , goodsBrand.updator as updator , goodsBrand.update_time as updateTime , goodsBrand.extends_params as extendsParams , goodsBrand.remark1 as remark1 , goodsBrand.remark2 as remark2
mapper.insert:
insert into goods_brand_tb
id,
brand_number,
brand_name,

brand_initial,
state,
is_delete,
directly_org_id,

mapper.update:
update goods_brand_tb
brand_number = #{brandNumber},
brand_name = #{brandName},
brand_english_name = #{brandEnglishName},
brand_initial = #{brandInitial},
state = #{state},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
directly_org_id = #{directlyOrgId},
hierarchy_id = #{hierarchyId},
creator_id = #{creatorId},
creator = #{creator},
create_time = #{createTime},
updator_id = #{updatorId},
updator = #{updator},
update_time = #{updateTime},
extends_params = #{extendsParams},
remark1 = #{remark1},
remark2 = #{remark2},
where id = #{id}
